wikipedia_page.main: John Overton (born 2 May 1956) is an English former footballer. He made 195 Football League appearances for Aston Villa, Halifax Town and Gillingham.

response: *John Overton (printseller) (1640–1713), seller of prints and maps who succeeded Peter Stent
*John Overton (judge) (1766–1833), judge at the Superior Court of Tennessee
*John Overton Comprehensive High School, Nashville, Tennessee
